body_html:
I think this commit is wrong, at least https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/README.md seems so.

Its doubling 'tools' in all urls, I guess it takes its parent folder (tools) as a basedir and adding tools/ to links its doubling that, resulting in links like https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/tools/autograd
body_text:
I think this commit is wrong, at least https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/README.md seems so.
Its doubling 'tools' in all urls, I guess it takes its parent folder (tools) as  a basedir and adding tools/ to links its doubling that, resulting in links like https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/tools/autograd
body:
I think this commit is wrong, at least https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/README.md seems so.

Its doubling 'tools' in all urls, I guess it takes its parent folder (tools) as  a basedir and adding _tools/_ to links its doubling that, resulting in links like https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/tools/autograd
